fullplot: The Peanuts gang perform the classic Broadway musical. In addition to the classic songs, we see Charlie Brown and his friends perform the various comedy sketches of the play.
plot: The Peanuts gang perform the classic Broadway musical. In addition to the classic songs, we see Charlie Brown and his friends perform the various comedy sketches of the play.
title: You're a Good Man, Charlie Brown
writers: Clark Gesner (based on the play by)
Charles M. Schulz (based on the comic strip by)
